signalslinkep:usageinfo-signalslinkep-te:
SignalsLink.EP
Extends the Signals mod with components that work with the Electrical Progressive mod.

Electrical Progressive
EP Switch
A switch controlled by a signal. Allows turning the transmission of electric current on or off.
If there is a signal on the input, the switch is on. If there is no signal on the input, the switch is off.
EP Meter
Allows obtaining information about the state of the electrical network to which the meter is connected.
If the input signal is 1, the output signal shows the charge state of the batteries in the network.
If the input signal is 2, the output signal shows the production/consumption balance of electricity. Values 1-7: consumption exceeds production, 8: consumption=production, 9-15: production exceeds consumption.
If the input is any other signal, the output is signal 0.
